law.catch_line: It shall be an unfair or deceptive trade practice under Title 13 of this article if a dealer:...
law.text:
It shall be an unfair or deceptive trade practice under Title 13 of this article if a dealer:
Fails to comply with the requirements of § 14-1802 of this subtitle; or
Denies a consumer the remedies provided by § 14-1803 of this subtitle.
